description:
An animation program that the girls are making for the school festival is selected as one of the invited products for an International Animation Event. OK! Girls! Let`s work together for the Cannes Film Festival or Venice Film Festival!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hot-Blooded Fighting Spirit! Pitiless Sergeant! Work Like a Devil, Sakuya
Nekketsu Toukon: Oni Gunsou-dono! Seisaku Shinkou Sakuya-san Desu
熱血闘魂・鬼軍曹どのっ! 制作進行サクヤさんです~
